parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>The post does not contain a CMF number. While the absence of a CMF number is not automatically disqualifying, it suggests the post might not be officially sanctioned electoral propaganda.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>The post explicitly mentions the PSD (Partidul Social Democrat) and encourages voters to vote for them.  This directly refers to a parliamentary candidate, fulfilling "Article 36 (7) - a".</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>The post is a paid Facebook advertisement, inherently designed to reach a wide audience. It's not a private message; therefore, it addresses the wide population, fulfilling "Article 36 (7) - c".</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>The primary objective of the post is to persuade voters in Maramureș County to vote for the PSD in the local elections. The call to action ("Votăm echilibrat, votăm PSD!") explicitly aims to influence the electoral outcome. This clearly fulfills "Article 36 (7) - c".</electoral-objective>
<journalism>The post does not present itself as journalistic. It lacks objective reporting, analysis, or diverse perspectives. Instead, it promotes a specific political party and candidate.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>The content is not a personal opinion; it's a clear and direct appeal for votes for a specific party. The mention of past promises and future plans is used to promote the party, not to express a personal viewpoint.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>1295415661810762</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The post fulfills all criteria of electoral propaganda as defined by Article 36 (7) of LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006. It refers to a specific political party (PSD), targets a wide audience through a paid Facebook advertisement, and has the clear objective of influencing voters to support the PSD.  The post's timing is crucial; even if the local elections are over, the post's content and intent clearly constitute electoral propaganda.  The absence of a CMF number does not negate this conclusion, as the post's content is undeniably promotional.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate><name>Gabriel Valer Zetea</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
  <candidate><name>PSD</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>PSD</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
Gabriel Valer Zetea, pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea unei reclame plătite pe Facebook după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, care promovează Partidul Social Democrat (PSD) și îndeamnă la vot pentru acesta, având ca efect electoral influențarea voturilor în favoarea PSD, fapt demonstrat prin conținutul explicit al postării ("Votăm echilibrat, votăm PSD!") și prin menționarea realizărilor trecute și a promisiunilor viitoare ale PSD pentru a atrage voturi.  Această postare, cu ID-ul 1295415661810762, constituie propagandă electorală interzisă după încheierea perioadei de campanie, conform legislației în vigoare.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
